sentences.sContent: So even to-day, when we fail to see the truth of religion, we seek in its observance an artistic gratification.
sentences.sContent_eng: So even to-day, when we fail to see the truth of religion, we seek in its observance an artistic gratification.
sentences.sCn: 所以，甚至在今天，在我们还看不到宗教的真理时，我们只能从宗教的仪式里去寻求艺术的满足。

sentences.sContent: We live in a culture of instant gratification.
sentences.sContent_eng: We live in a culture of instant gratification.
sentences.sCn: 我们生活在即时满足的文化中。
